job description:
Associate Scientist
San Diego, CA
6+ Month Contract

Seeking an Associate Scientist to assist Grain Processing Enzymes Product Technical Support team. This position will focus on the bench scale fermentation as well as enzymatic and analytical assays.

Job description/Principal Responsibilities: Design and carry out bench scale fermentation process under guidance of scientist. Perform enzymatic and analytical assays, analyze data, and troubleshoot experiments. Achieve successful completion of deliverables with efficiency and adherence to time constraints. Skills: BS in Biological Science, Biochemistry or related field with 4+ years of industry experience. Hands on experience with analytical instruments such as HPLC and GC. Knowledge of starch and sugar chemistry a plus. Ability to work in a multidisciplinary and fast paced environment, both independently and in a team setting. Excellent organization skills and detail oriented. Excellent communication skills. Highly motivated and enjoy working in a team-oriented environment.
